name: Portal Mushrooms - Fall To The Brim Of The Skyland
name_original: Portal Mushrooms - Fall To The Brim Of The Skyland
description:
Welcome! This is the Mushroom Portal. In this strange land, mushrooms are teleported through by pipes by an unknown force. How far can you teleport dem mushrooms? Let's find out!

facebook.com/reddstudiosapps
twitter.com/reddstudiosapps
reddstudios@outlook.com

- No IAPs, no micro transactions, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements.
- Move device left to right to teleport mushrooms
- Created by a developer with a heart
- Enjoy
